TextView.android:text: 13. Breastfeed on demand, both day and night (8 to 12 times) to build up your breast milk supply
13. Bachay ko maa ka dhood din ma 8 to 12 dafa daina lazmi ha, us sa maa ko dhood bh wafer miqdar ma ai ga

14. Crying is a late sign of hunger. Early signs that your baby wants to breastfeed include: 
 a) Restlessness 
 b) Opening mouth and turning head from side-to-side 
 c) Putting tongue in and out 
 d) Suckling on fingers and fists

14. Bachay ka rona is baat k ilammat ha k bachay ko shadeed bhoot lagi ha. Behtar ha k bacha ko ronay sa pehlay hi maa k dhood milay, aur is surat ma bacha: a. Baichan ho ga b. Apna moun kholay ga and apna sir idhar udhar goomai ga c. Moun sa zeban andar bahir karay gaApni unglian and kalaiyan choosay ga

15. Let your baby finish one breast before offering the other. Switching back and forth from one breast to the other prevents the baby from getting the nutritious ‘hind milk’. The ‘fore milk’ has more water and satisfies the baby’s thirst. The ‘hind milk’ has more fat and satisfies your baby’s hunger.

15. Bachay ko pehlay aik taraf sa poora dhood peenay dain, jaldi jaldi bachay k side change karnay sa bachay ko sahi dhood nahi milay ga jis ko baad ka dhood bola jata ha and wo dhood ghazaiyat sa bharpoor hota ha and asal ma bachay k bhook ko wohi khatam karta ha. Pehlay ana wala dhood sirf pani hota ha jis sa sirf bachay k peeyas kahatam hoti ha
16. Do @string/noT use bottles, teats or spouted cups. They are difficult to clean and can cause your baby to become sick
16. Dhood k botel, choosni and cups istimaal na karain. In cheezoun k safai ka khaas khayal rakhan parta ha and sahi safai na honay k soorat ma bacha beemar par sakta ha
17. If your baby is ill or sleepy, wake him or her to offer the breast often.
17. Agar app ka bacha beemar ha ya so raha ha, tu us ko muqar waqt utha ka maa apna dhood pilai
Key messages on good Breastfeeding positions
\n Dhood pilanay k tareeqay k mutaliq ehaam maloomat
1. Good positioning helps to ensure that your baby suckles well and helps you to produce a good supply of breast milk
1. Bachay k sahi position dhood pilatay waqt is liya zarori ha takay bacha sahi tarhan dhood pee sakay and maa ko sahi miqdar ma dhood ai

2. The four key points about your baby’s position are: straight, facing the breast, close, and supported: 
 a) The baby’s body should be straight, not bent or twisted, but with the head slightly back 
 b) The baby’s body should be facing the breast, not held flat to your chest or stomach, and he or she should be able to look up into your face. 
 c) The baby should be close to you. 
 d) You should support the baby’s whole body, not just the neck and shoulders, with your hand and arm.

2. Chaar zarori hidaayat app k bachay k position k hawalay sa: seedha, moun maa k seenay k taraf, maa k qareeb and sahi tarhan pakra howa 
 a) Bacha seedha honay chahiya, na jhooka howa na moora howa, and bachay ka sir thora sa pichay k taraf 
 b) Bachay ka jisam thora sa upper k taraf ho takay us ka moun maa k seenay k qareeb ho, and bacha upper k taraf dheekay 
 c) Bachay maa sa qareeb ho 
 d) Bachay ko apnay haath and bazu k madad sa is tarhan pakray takay us k puray jisam ko sahara milay, khali garden aur kanday nahi

3. There are different ways to position your baby: 
 a) Cradle position (most commonly used) 
 b) Cross cradle position (good for small babies) 
 c) Side-lying position (use to rest while breastfeeding and at night) 
 d) Under-arm position (use after caesarean section, if your nipples are painful or if you are breastfeeding twins or a small baby)

3. Bachay ko pakarnay k mukhtalif tareeqay han: 
 a) Jhoolay wali position (Sab sa zayda kiya janay wala tareeqa)) 
 b) Cross ma jhoolay wali position (chootay size k bachoun k zayda acha tareeqa) 
 c) Side pay lait k (Maa aram sa lait k bchay ko dhood pilai ya raat ma) 
 d) Operation k baad, ya agar maa ko nipples ma dard ho, ya jorrwa bachay ho, ya bacha chota ho
Key messages on good attachment
\n Bachay ka maa k saath achay sa jooray rakhnay k mutaliq zarori maloomat
1. Good attachment helps to ensure that your baby suckles well and helps you to produce a good supply of breast milk.
1. Bacha maa k saath sahi tarha joora rahay us sa bachay ko dhood peenay ma asani hoti ha and maa ko achi miqdar ma dhood ata ha
2. Good attachment helps to prevent sore and cracked nipples and ensures that Breastfeeding should not be painful.
2. Is sa maa k breast ma soozish nahi hoti and nipples ma dard bh nahi hota
3. Get help to improve the attachment if you experience pain.
3. Mahir sa rabta karain agar app ko kisi bh kisam ka dard mahsoos ho bachay ko dhood pilatay waqt

4. There are 4 signs of good attachment: 
 a) Baby’s mouth is wide open 
 b) You can see more of the darker skin (areola) above the baby’s mouth than below 
 c) Baby’s lower lip is turned outwards 
 d) Baby’s chin is touching mother’s breast

4. Achi tarhan munsaliq honay k chaar zaroroi niqaat: 
 a) Bachay ka moun achi tarhan khula ho 
 b) Maa k breast ka jo gehra rung ka hissay ha wo bachay k moun k upper wali side sa zayda nazar ai ga nicchay wali side k muqabil 
 c) Bachay k nichay ka hount bahir k janib moray ho ga 
 d) Bachay k thoodi maa k breast ko touch karay gee

5. The signs of effective suckling are: 
 a) The baby takes slow deep suckles, sometimes pausing. 
 b) You may be able to see or hear your baby swallowing after one or two suckles. 
 c) Suckling is comfortable and pain free for you. 
 d) Your baby finishes the feed, releases the breast and looks contented and relaxed. 
 e) The breast is softer after the feed.

5. Bacha sahi tarhan dhood pee raha ha us k zarori niqaat: 
 a) Bacha ruk ruk k dhood peeta ha 
 b) Maa ko mahsoos ho ga k bacha aik ya do dafa choosnay k baad dhood andar lay kar jata ha 
 c) Bacha jab dhood pee raha ho ga tu maa ko kisi bh kisam ka dard nahi ho ga 
 d) Bacha jab pait bhar k dhood pee lay ga tu khudi sa peena chor day ga 
 e) Dhood peelanay ka baad breast naram ho jay ga
6. Effective suckling helps you to produce milk and satisfy your baby
6. Agar bacha sahi tareeqay sad hood piya ga tu maa ko acha and wafir miqdar ma dhood ai ga

7. After your baby releases one breast offer your baby the other breast. This will ensure that your baby stimulates your milk production in both breasts, and also gets the most nutritious and satisfying milk.
7. Jab bacha aik side say dhood pee lay tu us ko dosri side sa dhood pilain. Is ma maa ko doun sidoun sa wafir miqdar ma dhood ai jis sa bachay k nashurma bh achi ho gee
Exclusive breastfeeding of low birth weight babies
\n Wo bachay jin ka pidaish k waqt wazan kaam ha un k liya sirf maa ka dhood pilanay k eham maloomat
1. Guide the mother about Skin-to-skin contact: Kangaroo mother care provides skin-to-skin contact, warmth and closeness to the mother’s Breast
1. Maa ko batain k bachay ko apnay app sa joray rakhna kitna zarori ha, jis ko hum Kangaroo care kehtay han, is sa bacha garam rehta ha and apni maa sa qareeeb bh
2. Breast milk is especially adapted to the nutritional needs of low birth weight infants.
2. Maa ko dhood un bachoun k liya bay hud faida mund ha jin ka pidaish k waqat wazan kaam hota ha
3. The best milk for a low birth weight infant, including babies born early, is the breast milk from the baby’s own mother
3. Wo bachay jin ka pidaish k waqt wazan kaam ho, ya jo waqt sa pehlay paida ho jain un ko maa ka dhood hi sab sa zayda faida day ga
4. The cross cradle and underarm positions are good positions for feeding a low birth weight baby.
4. Jhoolay wali position ya under arm position sab sa behtareen tareeqa ha un bachoun k liya jin ka pidaish k waqt wazan kaam hota ha
5. Breastfeed frequently to get baby use to the breast and to keep the milk flowing.
5. Bachay ko zayda sa zayda maa ka dhood pilain takay bacha maa k dhood peenay ka adi ho jay and maa ko zayda sa zayda dhood ai
6. Long slow feeds are fine. It is important to keep the baby at the breast.
6. Zayda dair tak thora thora dhood ana sahi ha, zayda aham yeh ha k bacha ma aka dhood peeya
7. If the baby sleeps for long periods of time, you may need to unwrap the baby or take off some of his or her clothes to help waken him or her for the feed.
7. Agar bacha zayda dair tak sota ha tu maa ko chahiya k us ko dhood k time par jaga k dhood pilay chahay bachay ko neend sa jagana kyoun na paray
8. Breastfeed the baby before he or she starts to cry.
8. Bacha ko ronay sa pehlay dhood peela daina chahiya
9. Earlier signs of hunger include a combination of the following: being alert and restless, opening mouth and turning head, putting tongue in and out, sucking on hand or fist
9. Bacha ko jab bhook tu us k nishani hoti ha: Bacha baichan hog a, ana moun kholay ga and sir idhar udhar ghoomay ga, apni zeban moun sa andar bahir karay ga and apnay haath aur unglian choosay ga
Feeding the sick baby less than 6 months of age
\n Agar bacha 6 mahina sa umer ma kaam ha and beemar ha tu us ko dhood peelanay k eham maloomat
1. Breastfeed more frequently during illness, including diarrhoea, to help the baby fight sickness, reduce weight loss and recover more quickly.
1. Bachay ko beemari k doran zayda sa zayda dhood peelana chahiya takay wo beemari sa lar sakay, us k quwat e madafiyat bharay, and jo wazan us ka beemari sa kaam howa wo us ko kami ko poora karay
2. Breastfeeding also provides comfort to your sick baby. If your baby refuses to breastfeed, encourage your baby until he or she takes the breast again.
2. Maa ka dhood peelanay sa beemar bachay aram sa rahay ga, aur agar bacha dhood na peeya tu phir bh maa ko chahiya k wo zabardasti maa ko apna dhood peelay
3. Give medicines recommended by your doctor/ health care provider.
3. Agar bachay ko koi dewai daini tu kisi mahir doctor k mashwara k bagair nahi dainai chahiya
4. If the baby is too weak to suckle, express breast milk to give the baby. This will help you to keep up your milk supply and prevent breast difficulties
4. Agar bacha kamzor ha aur us ma maa ka dhood peenay k himaat nahi ho maa ko chahiya k haath sa dhood nikal k ussay pilai, is sa maa ko dhood ata rahay ga and breast ma koi masla bh nahi ho ga
5. After each illness, increase the frequency of breastfeeding to help your baby regain health and weight.
5. Beemari k baad bachay ko maa apna dhood zayda sa zayda peelai takay bachay k sehat jaldi bahal ho jay
6. When you are sick, you can continue to breastfeed your baby. You may need extra food and support during this time.
6. Agar maa khud beemar ha tu wo bachay ko phir bh apna dhood pila sakti ha, is surat ma maa ko chahiya k wo apni giza ka khayal rakhay
Key nutritional messages
\n Maa k liya giza sa mutaliq eham maloomat
